column1: glenn warren varn| glenn w. varn passed away june 19
column5: 1929 and lived in dade city all of his life. glenn leaves behind his wife of 62 years
column6: eva; daughters valerie (harry) waldroff and kippi (wessley) moats; sister jeanette saunders; 3 grandchildren and 3 great-grandchildren. a private service and interment will be held at chapel hill gardens cemetery in dade city
